text: Other People's Relatives () is a 1956 Soviet drama movie directed by Mikhail Schweitzer.«Мичман Панин» и «Чужая родня»: где посмотреть фильмы классика советского кино Михаила ШвейцераЧУЖАЯ РОДНЯ It stars Nikolai Rybnikov, Nonna Mordyukova, and Nikolai Sergeyev. == Actors == * Nikolai Rybnikov as Fyodor Gavrilovich Soloveikov * Nonna Mordyukova as Stesha Ryashkina * Nikolai Sergeyev as Silanty Petrovich Ryashkin * Aleksandra Denisova as Alevtina Ryashkina * Yelena Maksimova as Varvara Stepanovna * Stepan Krylov as Miron == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1956 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Mikhail Schweitzer
title: Other People's Relatives
